body_html:
It works after I rewrite the L2 regularizer of regularizer.py in tensorflow\contrib\layers\python\layers
It also means that nn.l2_loss(weights) cause errors under Anaconda & win10 environment with GPU acceleration.

 #return standard_ops.multiply(my_scale, nn.l2_loss(weights), name=name)
 return standard_ops.multiply(
          my_scale,
          standard_ops.reduce_sum(math_ops.square(weights))/2,
          name=name)

It also means that nn.l2_loss(weights) cause errors under Anaconda & win10 environment with GPU acceleration.
 #return standard_ops.multiply(my_scale, nn.l2_loss(weights), name=name)

body:
It works after I rewrite the L2 regularizer of regularizer.py in tensorflow\contrib\layers\python\layers
It also means that nn.l2_loss(weights) cause errors under Anaconda & win10 environment with GPU acceleration. 

```
 #return standard_ops.multiply(my_scale, nn.l2_loss(weights), name=name)
 return standard_ops.multiply(
          my_scale,
          standard_ops.reduce_sum(math_ops.square(weights))/2,
          name=name)
```
